Posts.Content: My friend has metastatis breast cancer and she is been told to take Avastin + chemotherapy. She is now in India . Can anyone please reply the cost of this treatment in United states. Appreciate your reply and any additional information regarding Avastin. Doctor has suggested her to take. 500 ml of  Avastin dose  every 21 days alongwith sysplatin + Gemcite.
Posts.Title: Avastin & Doxil
